function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for ineffective antimicrobial coatings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and contamination","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of antimicrobial coatings","Technologies":"Advanced testing and quality control methods","People":"Public, employees, visitors","Owner":"Research and development teams, manufacturing companies"},{"Description":"Over-reliance on nano-coatings for disease prevention","Impact":"False sense of security and neglect of other preventive measures","Mitigation":"Education on the limitations of nano-coatings, promotion of holistic preventive strategies","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, public health communication tools","People":"Public, decision-makers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Long-term effectiveness and sustainability of antimicrobial coatings","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness over time, potential for environmental impact","Mitigation":"Research and development of long-lasting and environmentally friendly coatings","Technologies":"Sustainable materials, environmental impact assessments","People":"Public, environmental advocates","Owner":"Research and development teams, environmental organizations"}]}
